title: The Chain of Life
description: The World Is In Ruins. The Final Battle Has Begun. Death Is Inevitable…Despite escaping the massacre of Abonerra, Lincoln is finally learning he cannot escape his destiny. A destiny that may very well see his entire life slip between his fingers.El knows the only way to ensure victory is through sacrifice, yet that sacrifice will tear her apart from Lincoln and everything she holds dear, leaving her stuck with an impossible choice and no guarantees.Ben has worked so hard to retrieve Liv’s soul, but with the destruction to his home dimension and the human dimension, all that work has been undone, only held alive by the smallest sliver of hope that could change everything.
author: Johnathon Nicolaou
